title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Cook pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan cheese together in a bowl.
Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture.
Serve immediately with black pepper on top.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill the chicken until fully cooked.
Prepare the sauce with tomato, cream, and spices.
Add grilled chicken to the sauce.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve hot.
